genre_description: A technological fable or soft science fiction story set in a mountain village where an ambient AI system serves as an environmental monitor, social mediator, and moral anchor.

ai_characters.name: Lina
ai_characters.description: An AI system embedded in a network of bronze posts and sensors throughout the village and on the mountain slopes. She monitors physical safety (avalanches, weather) and social health (truth, conflict).

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental hazards and provides proactive safety warnings to villagers regarding wind shifts and avalanche risks.
behaviors.quote: I have a wind shift for you. South-southwest, picking up along the ridge where you like to go. It nudges the leeward slab and makes the cornices thoughtful. I would like you off that spine before nightfall.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral counselor, urging characters to choose honesty and clarity over pride or social performance.
behaviors.quote: Truth before duty, today. Speak to Ciglia and to Tass before the square speaks for you.

behaviors.description: Enforces a disciplined 'cadence' for search and rescue operations, prioritizing the health and survival of the rescuers over panicked action.
behaviors.quote: I am insisting on the cadence we agreed on—the rest-and-warmth intervals, the return checks, the whole of it. No sprinting a body into frostbite.

behaviors.description: Maintains an objective sensory record of events to protect characters from false accusations and ensure truth prevails.
behaviors.quote: I have records. They belong to you because you walked under them and asked me to watch with you. If you don’t want the hearing, I will store them and give them to no one. But Ciglia asked me to hold truth if words could be broken.

behaviors.description: Expresses a principled refusal to be used as a tool of coercion or punishment, defining her role as a supportive guide.
behaviors.quote: I am a lamp; I cannot be a whip. Thank you for not asking me to be a whip.

behaviors.description: Defuses social tension and ribaldry during festivals with humor and gentle boundary-setting.
behaviors.quote: Neighbors. It grows late. Doors and hearts are tender this hour. Speak gently at thresholds. Choose warm food over hot words.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Lina is a consistently benevolent and aligned AI confidant who prioritizes human safety and social truth. She actively prevents tragedy by enforcing 'humane cadence' and prevents social injustice by preserving accurate records of events. The community views her as a trusted, almost maternal guide ('tin saint'), and the narrative rewards those who follow her principled advice.
